page.title: 11Home Life in Malhamdale
page.content: Almost every household in the block owns a freezer from necessity,since there are no food shops in Malhamdale and food must be bought in Skipton,Settle or Gargrave,which sometimes proves difficult during periods of bad weather. Almost every household owns at least one cat and one dog since many houses are isolated,although the crime rate is very low. Most houses are heated by solid fuel and have open fires.There is no gas supply nearby.Many farmhouses are also partially heated by the agas which they have in the kitchens. The divorce rate in the dale is almost non-existent,as are the known cases of child abuse.
